it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class MultiPlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller
      • it.polimi.se2018.controller.MultiPlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ViewMessage>

    public class MultiPlayerController
extends Controller
    The controller for the MultiPlayer configuration. It implements the abstract methods of the class Controller.
    Author:
    michelemarzollo

    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiPlayerController

        public MultiPlayerController(Game game,
                             int turnDuration,
                             int timeOut)
        The constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        game - The instance of the class Game, which will describe the situation of the match for the whole duration of it.
        turnDuration - the maximum amount of time allowed for the player to make the move, before the turn is automatically skipped.
        timeOut - The amount of time, counted from the moment the last player was added, to wait before making the game start if there aren't still 4 players.

        Parameters:

        protected int getDraftAmount()
        The method to return the number of dice that will form the DraftPool during the whole game; in multi-player configuration is given by the formula: 2 * number of players + 1.

        Parameters:

      • calculateScores

        protected void calculateScores()
        The method to calculate the scores of the players at the end of the game.

        The score of each player is given by four different elements: (1) The score given by each PublicObjectiveCard of the game, applied to the player's final Pattern. (2) The score given by the player's PrivateObjectiveCard, applied to the player's final Pattern (in MultiPlayer configuration the player has just one PrivateObjectiveCard). (3) One additional point for each unused token. (4) One less point for each unfilled cell in the Player's Pattern.

        After calculating the player's score, the method sets to the final score the attribute score in Player

        Specified by:
        calculateScores in class Controller

      • registerPlayer

        protected void registerPlayer(ViewMessage message)
        The method to register a new player to the game before the start of the game.

        When a new player applies to the game it is registered. The player can also deregister from the game (the behaviour is delegated to disconnectPlayer() in Controller). When the players are two, the timer is started and after timeOut seconds, if there are still at least two players, the game is started. When the number of players is 4 the game is started independently from the timer. If the number of players is less than two the game is not started

        Specified by:
        registerPlayer in class Controller
        Parameters:
        message - the message generated by the view, containing the name of the new player.

      • endGame

        protected void endGame(ViewMessage message)
        The actions to do when the game is finished.
        Specified by:
        endGame in class Controller
        Parameters:
        message - The message generated by the view.

      • disconnectPlayer

        protected void disconnectPlayer(ViewMessage message)
        Disconnects a player.

        If the game has not yet began, the player is removed from the game, but if the game has already been set up, his connection status is updated to disconnected and won't be able to make moves until he reconnects.

        Specified by:
        disconnectPlayer in class Controller
        Parameters:
        message - The message generated by the view.

      • reconnectPlayer

        protected void reconnectPlayer(ViewMessage message)
        Reconnects a disconnected player to the game.
        Specified by:
        reconnectPlayer in class Controller
        Parameters:
        message - The message generated by the view.
